item.title: Report E-2025020397
item.description:
Report E-2025020397

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-28T00:58:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-27
  • City: WINCHESTER
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 35000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1203 ET, Thomas with XPO-XLX notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported that approximately 8-10 gallons of synergex released from an IBC Tote due to possibly tipping over ( xpo is waiting on more photos). The release impacted inside trailer#.463-2568. No storm drains or waterways are reported to be impacted by the release. ERTS will proceed to dispatch a contractor to the site to complete cleanup activities. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 20-gallons of UN3149 Synergex product released to an 8’x25’ trailer floor and gravel area underneath trailer which was covered with snow and ice. the tote. Contractors transferred the UN3149 Synergex to a new tote and placed original labels on, rinsed down trailer and containerized (8) 55-gallon poly totes with the neutralized impacted soil, ice gravel, PPE, cardboard and pallet pieces. The waste will be taken to the local XPO facility where terminal personnel will manage
